title: Link Wray - Jack The Ripper (1963) Sundazed 180gr. LP 24-96
description:
(nmr)

Link Wray 
"Jack The Ripper"

originally released:
1963 Swan Records SLP-510

this reissue:
2005 Sundazed 180 gram pressing (first Sundazed pressing, black vinyl)
matrix/deadwax info (hand etched):
LP 5192 A RE
LP 5192 B RE
mastered by Bob Irwin

tracks:
A1 Mr. Guitar 		
A2 My Beth	
A3 Deacon Jones 		
A4 Steel Trap 		
A5 Cross Ties 		
A6 Jack The Ripper 
		
B1 Fat Back 		
B2 Run Chicken Run 		
B3 Dinosaur 		
B4 Big Ben 		
B5 Mash Potato Party 		
B6 Rumble

Total running time - 27:32

No musicians credited. Likely musicians on most tracks:
Link Wray - guitar
Doug Wray - bass
Shorty Horton - drums
Bobby Howard - organ
Vernon Wray - guitars, production, engineering

vinyl LP transfer at 24-bit 96khz
transfer info:
Nitty Gritty Record Master
Music Hall MMF 9.1
sticky hand stylus cleaning
Grado Master Reference 1 cartridge
Bellari VP-130 phono preamp, with vintage Telefunken 12AX7 w/smooth plates
Mytek Stereo192 ADC (analog to digital converter)
TT Weights center weight, Blue Jean LC-1 interconnects
software used: Soundforge 10.0, ClickRepair 3.4.1 (in manual mode), Flac frontend 1.7.1
Note - original recordings are mono. Left channel selected after manual declicking, and copied to both channels.
